amendment.description: Amendment requires DOD to provide an annual report to Congress assessing the cumulative impact of individual export licenses granted by the U.S. to countries of concern.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 10 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to require DOD to provide an annual report to Congress assessing the cumulative impact of individual export licenses by the U.S. to countries of concern.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
